name: geophysical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with the study of the rocks and other substances that make up the earth and the physical processes happening on, in, and above the earth: geophysical and geological phenomena She is collecting geophysical data about the largely unexplored polar regions. See
geophysics
More examplesFewer examplesThey hope to gather more current data on the geophysical characteristics of the reef.A geophysical survey revealed other uncovered buildings nearby.The data helped to build a geological and geophysical picture of the land.
